casebody.data:
Borger, Appellee, v. Utica Mutual Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Borger v. Utica Mut. Ins. Co., 105 Ohio St.3d 95, 2005-Ohio-570.]

(No. 2004-1396 Submitted February 2, 2005 Decided March 2, 2005.) Thorson, Switala, Wilkins & Snead, Gilbert B. Switala, and Joseph J. Mondock, for appellee. Freund, Freeze & Arnold, Christopher W. Carrigg, and Charity S. Robl, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Hollon v. Clary, 104 Ohio St.3d 526, 2004-Ohio-6772, 820 N.E.2d 881.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Resnicic and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
